member.summary: Represents a capture handler working as a circular buffer.

member.summary: Call to enable motion detection.
member.param: The motion configuration.
A callback for when motion is detected.
An optional callback for when the record duration has passed.

member.name: M:MMALSharp.Handlers.CircularBufferCaptureHandler.EnableMotionDetection
member.summary: Enables motion detection. When configured, this will instruct the capture handler to detect motion.

member.name: M:MMALSharp.Handlers.CircularBufferCaptureHandler.DisableMotionDetection
member.summary: Disables motion detection. When configured, this will instruct the capture handler not to detect motion.

member.summary: Call to start recording to FileStream.
